AdventureAPIDAO - Class in persistence.json.adventure
Class that implements the methods described in the AdventureDAO interface, and will be used as a way to physically separate the persistence layer from the rest of the application.
AdventureAPIDAO() - Constructor for class persistence.json.adventure.AdventureAPIDAO
Constructor for the adventure DAO that uses the API.
AdventureDAO - Interface in persistence.json.adventure
Interface that abstracts the persistence of adventures from uppers.
AdventureJsonDAO - Class in persistence.json.adventure
Class that implements the methods described in the AdventureDAO interface, and will be used as a way to physically separate the persistence layer from the rest of the application.
AdventureJsonDAO(String) - Constructor for class persistence.json.adventure.AdventureJsonDAO
Parametrized constructor to persist adventures in a JSON file, while being able to read adventure information.
AdventureManager - Class in business
Class that focuses on logic related to adventures and connects the business layer to lower ones, specifically the persistence layer.
AdventureManager(DataMenuOptions) - Constructor for class business.AdventureManager
Default constructor, which uses either the JSON Data Access Object for adventures with a fixed file or the API Data Access Object for adventures.
ApiHelper - Class in persistence
Helper class with the responsibility of reading and posting Strings to an HTTPS API.
